original_text: there also I will meet with the Israelites, and the place will be consecrated by my glory.
korean_text: 내가 거기서 이스라엘 자손을 만나리니 내 영광으로 말미암아 회막이 거룩하게 될지라

sentences.original_text: there also I will meet with the Israelites
and the place will be consecrated by my glory
sentences.korean_translation: 그 곳은 나의 영광으로 거룩하게 되리라
